subject: Dearest Customer,
body:
Dearest Customer,
Greetings of the Day,our esteemed company has been waiting on the
transfer remittance receipt from your company regarding the first
deposit of $40,000 of our 100,000 pieces our 3m n95 face masks.If the
transfer has been made,send us the remittance reciept for confirmation
on our side so we proceed with your shipment immediateley.
Add Us on Whatsapp to Fasten Our Communications:Whatsapp: +1 (719) -582-8498
Thanks/Regards
Mr.Daan S.-Export Manager
Private Medicines Supplies
Norway Branch:
Address: Jernbanetorget 6,0154 Oslo,Norway
Phone:+47 409 912 97
Email:info@privatemedicinessupplies.store
UK Branch :
Phone :+44 7404 418980
Email : 
info@privatemedicinessupplies.store
Website: ww w.privatemedicinessupplies.store
Address: The Street, Brandeston, Woodbridge, England, IP13 7AD, United Kingdom.

subject: Re:  Dearest Customer,
body:
Dear Manager,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that we have not yet received the remittance receipt for the first deposit of our order. Could you please provide us with a copy of this receipt so we can proceed with the shipment?

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best wishes,
Francis
